## ‚úÖ Ho√†n th√†nh s·ª≠a l·ªói m√†u text trong light mode!

T√¥i ƒë√£ th·ª±c hi·ªán c√°c thay ƒë·ªïi to√†n di·ªán ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o t·∫•t c·∫£ text trong header hi·ªÉn th·ªã r√µ r√†ng trong c·∫£ light v√† dark mode:

### üîß **C√°c thay ƒë·ªïi ƒë√£ th·ª±c hi·ªán:**

#### 1. **TƒÉng opacity c·ªßa header background:**
- ‚úÖ **Khi scroll:** `bg-white/90` ‚Üí `bg-white/95`
- ‚úÖ **Khi kh√¥ng scroll:** `bg-white/70` ‚Üí `bg-white/85`
- ‚úÖ **M·ª•c ƒë√≠ch:** T·∫°o background tr·∫Øng ƒë·∫≠m h∆°n ƒë·ªÉ text t·ªëi hi·ªÉn th·ªã r√µ r√†ng

#### 2. **S·ª≠ d·ª•ng dynamic className v√† inline style:**
- ‚úÖ **Dynamic className:** `${darkMode ? 'text-gray-100' : 'text-gray-900'}`
- ‚úÖ **Inline style v·ªõi WebkitTextFillColor:** Force m√†u text ngay c·∫£ khi c√≥ CSS conflicts
- ‚úÖ **M√†u c·ª• th·ªÉ:** 
  - Light mode: `#111827` (gray-900)
  - Dark mode: `#f3f4f6` (gray-100) ho·∫∑c `#ffffff` (white)
